proyectosLista.descripcion: This portfolio is a project in itself. Depending on where you enter from, the context adapts a different proposal for each user. Try using the links I leave below and click on them to see how it works according to the source.
lista: Language context.
Theme context.
Content adaptation according to time of day.
PHP for basic forms.
Use of PrimeReact, PrimeCSS, PrimeIcons libraries.
proyectosLista.actualidad: There are always new features to add.

proyectosLista.descripcion: I developed a pure PHP web system (without frameworks) to optimize workflows in Autodesk BIM 360/ACC.
lista: User authentication with session control.
Project visualization and key information management.
Issue management and permissions for project access.
Creation and tracking of trouble tickets in BIM 360 and ACC.
User tracking to monitor activity and inactivity in Autodesk.
proyectosLista.seguimiento: Our team sold the solution to a corporate group; I participated in the migration to React/TypeScript/AWS as a collaborator and currently maintain and improve the production version.
proyectosLista.actualidad: I learned to turn technical criticism into rapid growth, to maintain complex systems in enterprise environments, and the importance of clean architectures (learned the hard way).

links.texto: I do not include links, only on request and with permission from their owners, who will have no problem.

proyectosLista.descripcion: After developing my first app with what I had learned, I created this app that helped me classify used items on second-hand platforms, which allowed me to buy, sell, and generate extra income. Today, my main app is still in development, and I continue to create new things constantly.
lista: Integration with MercadoLibre APIs to show the latest news on used video games.
Implementation of models (MVC) to structure the code in a modular way.
User authentication and role-based management.
Token renewal and retrieval via cron jobs.
Automated data extraction with cron jobs.
Optimized pagination to load dynamic content based on the requested page.
Administration panel to manage posts and users.
Centralized error logging system, recording and displaying errors in one place.
Access control to site sections based on user roles.
Responsive design optimized for mobile devices.
proyectosLista.seguimiento: MercadoLibre changed requirements and restricted endpoints, so the app is waiting for a redesign.

proyectosLista.descripcion: I performed the complete migration of two WordPress websites from one hosting to another, ensuring the transfer of files, databases, and emails.
lista: Backed up and restored the MySQL database and site files.
Configured the environment on the new hosting, ensuring compatibility with PHP and MySQL.
Updated and adjusted the domain and DNS configuration.
Recreated and configured email accounts on the new hosting, ensuring correct operation.
Optimized site load and server settings.
Verified the functionality of the site and plugins after the migration.
Implemented security measures to protect the site in its new location.

links.texto: I do not include links, only on request and with permission from their owners, who will have no problem.

proyectosLista.descripcion: A blog dedicated to sharing personal experiences, with affiliate links and useful calculators for babies. After creating the first version of my portfolio, I wanted to continue creating components and built this site, but it is missing something important (time and soul). I will update it soon.
lista: Personal experiences in raising and caring for babies.
Affiliate links to recommended products.
Useful tools such as calculators for child well-being.
